Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The task produce two POWL models one with potential unfairness XOR branch for community affiliation check and one without unfairness no XOR branch all go through same cultural fit check Use appropriate activity labels ReceiveApplication DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo SkillAssessment CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck ManagerialReview FinalDecision Use loop for data completeness XOR for bias etc

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to provide the POWL models in code following the example shown import pm4py etc The code must define the models Thus we need to generate two POWL model objects one with XOR branch that includes CommunityAffiliationCheck and the other with just a single cultural fit evaluation no XOR Also need to incorporate loops

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The loops in POWL are defined as A B which is a loop node between submodels A and B

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We can create a loop for data completeness after ReceiveApplication we go to DataCompletenessCheck The loop may be do ReceiveApplication then check DataCompletenessCheck maybe its a loop operator In practice we can have loop node that repeats RequestMoreInfo until data is complete then proceed Simplify Lets define the initial part ReceiveApplication to DataCompletenessCheck to maybe RequestMoreInfo to loop We can design as ReceiveApplication Loop that checks completeness Check Transition label DataCompletenessCheck RequestInfo Transition label RequestMoreInfo Loop OperatorPOWL operator Operator LOOP children Check RequestInfo

Name: Validation - PE
Text: typical representation loop OperatorPOWL operator Operator LOOP children Check RequestInfo means execute Check then either exit loop or execute RequestInfo then Check again However to model that we need a condition Check to RequestInfo if incomplete But lets keep simple Simplify Represent loop as DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo That models a loop where DataCompletenessCheck is done first then either exit or execute RequestMoreInfo then repeat That matches a typical pattern while data incomplete ask for more info Thus we need root StrictPartialOrder with nodes ReceiveApplication loop SkillAssessment

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Thus define ReceiveApp Transition label ReceiveApplication DataCompletenessCheck Transition label DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo Transition label RequestMoreInfo LoopData OperatorPOWL operator Operator LOOP children DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo SkillAssessment Transition label SkillAssessment CulturalFitCheck Transition label CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck Transition label CommunityAffiliationCheck ManagerialReview Transition label ManagerialReview FinalDecision Transition label FinalDecision

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now for unfair model after SkillAssessment we have XOR choice either go to CulturalFitCheck standard OR go to CommunityAffiliationCheck which leads to biased outcome Then after the chosen branch we go to ManagerialReview then FinalDecision Thus we need XorUnfair OperatorPOWL operator Operator XOR children CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then we need to order SkillAssessment to XorUnfair XorUnfair to ManagerialReview ManagerialReview to FinalDecision Thus rootunfair StrictPartialOrder nodes ReceiveApp LoopData SkillAssessment XorUnfair ManagerialReview FinalDecision Add edges ReceiveApp to LoopData LoopData to SkillAssessment SkillAssessment to XorUnfair XorUnfair to ManagerialReview ManagerialReview to FinalDecision

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Now for fair model after SkillAssessment we directly go to CulturalFitCheck no XOR Then ManagerialReview then FinalDecision Thus we can define CulturalFitCheckFair Transition label CulturalFitCheck Then rootfair StrictPartialOrder nodes ReceiveApp LoopData SkillAssessment CulturalFitCheckFair ManagerialReview FinalDecision Add edges ReceiveApp to LoopData LoopData to SkillAssessment SkillAssessment to CulturalFitCheckFair CulturalFitCheckFair to ManagerialReview ManagerialReview to FinalDecision

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Now we need to produce code for these two models Possibly they want two separate POWL model objects The final answer should be in the form of Python code using pm4py Should include import statements Thus final answer Provide code for both models with comments explaining We should also perhaps give a textual description of the two models as a summary But the problem wants produce two POWL models So likely they just want the code Now produce answer accordingly
